item.title: Taichi Lang Seminar
item.description: I gave a seminar (in French) about Taichi Lang, a Python JIT for versatile GPU computing.

item.title: Generalised Swath Profile Tutorial
item.description: Notebook-style tutorial introducing transverse and longitudinal swath profiles in TopoToolbox, with river integration and practical parameter choices.
